name: Lunar Nightfall
description:
My submission to the UA Game Dev Fall 2022 Game Jam. The theme was "Countdown to Nightfall."

Controls:

A controller is required to play.

Left Stick - Move

Right Stick - Aim

Right Trigger - Shoot
